pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Doll Craft India dollcraft@gmail.com Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Overview: Our Privacy Policy outlines the information we collect, how it is used, and the measures we take to safeguard your data. Information Collection: We collect personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a purchase or sign up for our newsletter. Usage of Information: The information collected is used to process your orders, provide customer support, and send updates about our products and services. Data Protection: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Third-Party Services: We may share your information with trusted third-party services to facilitate our operations, such as payment processors and shipping companies. Marketing Communications: With your consent, we may use your information to send you promotional materials and updates about new products and offers. Data Retention: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. Children's Privacy: Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. Your Rights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, as well as to restrict or object to its processing. Policy Updates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and we will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. International Data Transfers: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, with appropriate safeguards in place. Data Breach Response: In the event of a data breach, we will notify affected individuals and relevant authorities as required by law. Consent Withdrawal: You may withdraw your consent for us to use your personal information at any time by contacting us. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at dollcraft@gmail.com. Governing Law: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of India, and any disputes will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. Effective Date: This Privacy Policy is effective as will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future. Get started Pages HomeAbout usContactsExperience Utilities ArtProgressNewsOur Team © Doll Craft. All Rights Reserved 2024. Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Doll Craft India dollcraft@gmail.com Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Terms and Conditions Terms and Conditions Overview: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Doll Craft India website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these terms. Website Access: You must be at least 18 years old to use our website. By accessing or using our website, you represent that you are at least 18 years old. Intellectual Property: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is the intellectual property of Doll Craft India and may not be used or reproduced without permission. Product Descriptions: We make every effort to accurately describe our products, but we cannot guarantee that descriptions are complete, current, or error-free. Order Acceptance: Your order is an offer to purchase our products. We reserve the right to accept or decline orders at our discretion. Pricing and Payment: Prices for our products are listed in Indian Rupees (INR) and are subject to change without notice. Payment is required at the time of purchase. Shipping: We aim to ship orders business days. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and shipping method. Return and Exchange Policy: We accept returns and exchanges days of purchase. Items must be unused and in their original condition. Limitation of Liability: Doll Craft India is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or products. Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold Doll Craft India harmless from any claims, damages, or losses arising from your violation of these terms or your use of our website. Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our website will be resolved through arbitration in accordance with Indian law. Modification of Terms: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Severability: If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue to be valid and enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by law. Waiver: Our failure to enforce any provision of these terms does not waive our right to enforce such provision in the future. Entire Agreement: These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and Doll Craft India regarding your use of our website and services. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms and Conditions, please contact us at dollcraft@gmail.com. Governing Law: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of India, and any disputes will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. Effective Date: These Terms and Conditions are effective will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future. pages.thanks: Thank You - Doll Craft India Thank you! Thank you for contacting us! We appreciate your support and trust in Doll Craft India. Each doll is made with the utmost care and attention to detail, embodying the craftsmanship and love of our skilled artisans. We hope our creation brings joy and delight to your collection or as a gift to a loved one. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our customer service team is here to help and ensure you have a wonderful experience with Doll Craft India. Stay connected with us on social media for updates on new dolls, special promotions, and behind-the-scenes looks at our workshop. Thank you once again for supporting handmade artistry. Home
